name: Dice Wavers
description:
FIRST TASK IS TO PICK UP THE PISTOL NEXT TO THE  BIG DICE UNDER THE SIGN!!

In Dice Wavers, you are a adventurous gravedigger, who wondered into the wrong grave. Your task is to survive the continous waves of undead, while rolling a giant magical dice that grants you with different curses, blessings, and weapons. After each wave, head near the spawn to find the dice, witch you have to interact with at the END of every wave.

Interact - e

Walk - WASD

Inspect weapon - Q

Side note: Flying eyes are super op, try getting close to them, than getting distance to heal! Listen to the deeper sound cue when shooting, to know if you damaged them.

Created by Balinto and Darking
